verbose_text: Consistent with a role for Smad3 in the transcriptional activation of PDL2, PDL1, and CD103, we found BMDCs and ex vivo isolated splenic and MLN DCs from Smad3 deficient (Smad3 -/-) mice express significantly lower levels of PDL2, PDL1, and CD103 (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY).
